(Commencement) Order 2022.

title: powers conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No.
heading: 2. The 1st day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 8 of
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 8 of 

the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No. 44 of 2021) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 June, 2022. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [334] 3

title: powers conferred on me by section 1(3) of the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the commencement of section 8 of the Social Welfare 
Act 2021 with effect from 01 July 2022. 

The purpose of section 8 is to provide for an extension of the entitlement to 
Parent’s Benefit for each qualifying parent from 5 weeks to 7 weeks. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [334]
